metadata.name: Deca Durabolin Inj 100mg ml 50 mg Solution

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Used to manage hypertension and tachycardia Also used to treat glaucoma

contraindications.disease: Symptoms of overdose include bradycardia cardiac failure hypotension and brochospasm
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Bupranolol is a competitive nonselective beta blocker similar to propanolol without intrinsic sympathomimetic activity
